sn50.45-54:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya panca balani bhavetabbani.
sn50.45-54:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, saddhabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
sn50.45-54:1.11: pannabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn50.45-54:1.12: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya imani panca balani bhavetabbani”ti.
